results.title: Professor Erikson. Part 2
results.creator_credit: James L. Brown and KUHT Film Productions
results.brief_description: An investigation of some theories of psychoanalysis, and personality growth in relation to the work of Dr Erik Erikson, of Harvard University, a pioneer in the field of child analysis and research. Part 2 deals with the Libido theory, Ego-identity, Identity crisis, Positive and negative identity, existentialism, cross-cultural research, fixation and the value of psycho-therapy. The ensuing discussion touches upon Erikson’s relationship to the theories of Freud; additions and modifications to subsequent theories; the crisis of adolescence; and the problems facing psycho-analysis today.

results.title: Professor Erikson. Part 1
results.creator_credit: James L. Brown and KUHT Film Productions
results.brief_description: An investigation of some theories of psychoanalysis, and personality growth. The film takes the form of an interview between Dr Erik Erikson, of Harvard University, a pioneer in the field of child analysis and research and Dr Richard Evans, of the University of Houston. They discuss Erikson’s theory of the eight stages of psycho development. Part 1 and 2 produced under a grant awarded by the national Science Foundation, USA.

results.title: Professional Icing at Home
results.brief_description: Jean Bowring demonstrates how to decorate a birthday cake using simple equipment and techniques. A fruit cake is first covered with fondant icing and then decorated using an icing bag and assortment of tubes. The film concludes with examples of more elaborate work in which the same simple techniques of decoration have been used.

results.title: Probation officer
results.creator_credit: J.B. Holmes, Donald Alexander and Data Film Productions
results.brief_description: A study of the cast cope of duties which Probation Officers are called upon to perform; the case of a young girl is presented. Because she is unhappy at home, she seeks satisfaction elsewhere, gets into bad company and is convicted of stealing. Through the understanding and help of the Probation Officer, he girl’s home life is improved, and the girl is put on probation instead of being sent to gaol. The purpose of the film is to encourage recruitment of suitable people to the probation service; their training is shown , and the necessary educational requirements indicated.

results.title: The Prize
results.brief_description: Snowy, a six-year-old boy wins a goat at a country show, and takes it home to show his friend, Lisa. However, the goat is lost andn suspicion falls on two boys, Dan and Marcus. There is a chase down-river in sawn-off barrels, a fight in the water and a lucky escape when the river reaches a waterfall.

results.title: Principles of ultrasonics
results.creator_credit: Jack Chambers and Data Film Productions
results.brief_description: Indicates the relation and range of sonic and ultrasonic waves. Also shows how ultrasonic waves are detected and the various types of wave generator used to propagate them; their properties and the uses to which they can be put.

results.title: The Pressure of light
results.brief_description: Light pressure on a thin foil suspended in high vacuum sets the foil into oscillation. It leads up to this by a discussion of the Crookes radiometer and the effect - not light pressure - that causes it to rotate. The role of light pressure in the universe is also briefly discussed.
